GameOver.synopsis: The player has reached a dead end in their journy, resulting in them becoming a thrall of the Absolute. This directly leads to a game over screen.

GameOver_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: |You've run out of options in the Astral Prism with the Emperor gone, rejected Raphael's deal and Orpheus forever locked away. Nothing to do but lay down and die.|

GameOver_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: |The Emperor now dead and no longer can protect you, you become enthralled by the Absolute.|
